author: Natasha Lomas
title: Leverice is a team messenger app that’s taking aim at information overload
description: Meet Leverice: A team messenger and collaboration platform that’s aiming to compete with b2b giants like Slack by tackling an issue that continues to plague real-time messaging — namely, ‘always-on’ information overload. This means these tools can feel like t…
